item.title: Authenticating Spring Boot apps on AKS with MSI
item.description: Last week I was looking for the best solution to connect to Azure services for a few pods within Azure Kubernetes Service. These services are build with Spring Boot and my first idea was to only connect to Azure KeyVault. Along the way I discovered the awesomeness of the just released AKS Managed Service Identities. Based on my experience and learning path I extended it to other Azure Services as well, and included Azure Storage in this blog post as an extra example.
